response.overview: its a story of Mithu who is in love with a girl since his childhood, but unfortunately he unable to grab her attention. mithu will get Frustrated with the entire situation, he attempts to commit suicide but he is saved by his friends Samar and Asif. they decides to help Mithu, they take him to love guru Uttam Tonge, who teaches them how to propose a girl.
response.title: Atumgiri
